name: Soccer Legends (itch)
description:
Soccer Legends is a soccer game project for mobile devices, belonging to the gacha and simulation genre. In it, the player must advance in the matches, to get all the characters and get to improve them to have the best team.

The game has a graphic section that combines pixel art and cartoon drawings with 2D animations. 

MODES

The game will have 2 major game modes:

  • And these are the ones you will fight in History mode (PVE).
  • If the challenges of the institutes do not suppose any challenge, you can try the online mode and face your players against the other person (PVP).

GAMEPLAY

Within the gameplay the player will have to make decisions such as:

  • Make your players change their strategy, modifying the way they develop on the field.
  • Order your players to pass or kick. The pass gives strategy to the plays and the shot is the most important thing to score a goal.

When 2 players collide, a battle event is generated. In these battle events the possibilities of the two players are measured to win according to the stats of each one. In these battles you can:

  • Playing risky by swiping to the right will raise the player's stats to win the battle but you have a chance of failing and receiving a penalty
  • Take a safer strategy. Where you will not have any bonus but I do not have any penalty.
  • Use a special attack that depends on each player and that grants bonuses and variations in the unique gameplays. In addition, these animations are accompanied by a detailed 2D animation for the winner.
